Interface NBodyProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
CUDANBodyProvider, MulticoreNBodyProvider, OpenCLNBodyProvider
public interface NBodyProvider
Interface for N-Body simulation providers.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Method

    computeForces(double[] positions, double[] masses, double[] forces, double G, double softening)

    String
    getName()
    Returns the name of this provider.

  • Method Details

    • computeForces

      void computeForces(Real[] positions, Real[] masses, Real[] forces, Real G, Real softening)
      Computes gravitational forces between particles.
      Parameters:
      positions - Flattened array of positions [x0, y0, z0, x1, y1, z1, ...]
      masses - Array of masses [m0, m1, ...]
      forces - Output flattened array of forces [fx0, fy0, fz0, ...]
      G - Gravitational constant
      softening - Softening parameter to avoid singularities

    • computeForces

      void computeForces(double[] positions, double[] masses, double[] forces, double G, double softening)
      Computes gravitational forces using double primitives.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of this provider.
      Returns:
      provider name
